import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import MiniPost from'./MiniPost';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderedPostsList=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchOrderedPosts=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const response=await fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/api/posts/ordered`);if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to fetch ordered posts');}const data=await response.json();setPosts(data);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchOrderedPosts();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error]});}if(!posts||posts.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No posts found."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mini-posts",children:posts.map(post=>{return post&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MiniPost,{post:post},post.id);})});};export default OrderedPostsList;
